allow: Bash(powershell "Get-Process node | Where-Object {$_Path -like ''*mentalspace-ehr-v2*''} | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, @{Name=''Port'';Expression={(Get-NetTCPConnection -OwningProcess $_Id -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_LocalPort -eq 3001 -or $_LocalPort -eq 5175}).LocalPort}}")
